summary: This is a brief email correspondence from July 1, 2021, forwarding a case update document titled 'PC_Unitr_Short_Form_Update.7.2.21.docx' to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York. It appears to be an internal update on a case, likely related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Case Update Correspondence
events.description: An email was sent forwarding a case update document to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: An email dated July 1, 2021, was sent regarding a case update.
The correspondence was directed to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
An attached document titled 'PC_Unitr_Short_Form_Update.7.2.21.docx' was forwarded.
The document is part of the Epstein case files (EFTA00040663).
